Method that checks the multilingual overlap of several synsets and terminological entries from TermBases that have been previously matched based on their English words

checkBNRelations(BabelSynset) - Method in class compare.ResourceComparison
Checks whether a BabelNet synset has any relations that are not in the list of relations we wish to omit Stops if one such relation is found and returns true
checkCNRelations(String) - Method in class compare.ResourceComparison
Checks whether a conceptNet id has any relations that are not in the list of relations we wish to omit Retrieves all associated and valid relations from the Database and returns true if relations are found
checkPOS(String, String, Set<String>) - Method in class dbReader.LoadTermBase
Checks if any other similar ids or relation targets can be utilized to obtain pos information for a specific conceptNet id
combineCNWithTerminologies(Set<TermEntry>, Set<TermEntry>, Set<TermEntry>) - Method in class compare.ResourceComparison
ConceptNet entries that are to be merged with IATE and Termium because it overlaps in more than three words across langauges
combineEntries(BabelSynset, Set<TermEntry>, Set<TermEntry>, Set<TermEntry>) - Method in class compare.ResourceComparison
First writes all BabelNet data and metadata to the EVALution synset and then merges it with the synsets of the other resources
